content.title: Funded in 5 hours—You Made It Happen! 🎉
content.creator:
Globotok
January 26, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
 We are deeply grateful for your generous pledges that enabled us to reach the target amount on Kickstarter in just 5 hours.
 Above all, we wish to express our thanks to every single person who supported our project. Your trust and support have played a crucial role in our success. You not only helped us surpass our goal but also unlocked greater opportunities and possibilities for our project.
As a way of thanking our backers, we would like to introduce PledgeBoost & Kickbooster to you.
  ( 1 ) PledgeBoost
🎁🎁Share & Back for Exclusive Rewards!
1️⃣Become a Booster
2️⃣Share your unique referral link
3️⃣Earn a 20% commission for every pledge made through your link.
( 2 ) Kickbooster
🎁🎁Share & Back for Exclusive Rewards!
1️⃣Become a Booster
2️⃣Share your unique referral link
3️⃣Earn a 20%  commission for every pledge made through your link.
If you have any questions or feedback, please feel free to reach out to us. Thank you once again for your support!
Best wishes,
Globotok Team
